Name: シルヴァリオ ラグナロク
About the game: 'Silverio Saga Series' is a popular Visual Novel in Japan. Ryo Takahama, who was in charge of the main scenario, is loved by many fans because he has created attractive characters and wonderful stories. This is his latest visual novel 'Silverio Ragnarok'. The revenge play performed by the main characters who have been deprived of many things by God will give you the best experience. ※CAUTION：This Game is 『Silverio Ragnarok E-15』ver. This game does not include additional elements. STORY: In the infallible 1000 year kingdom, the god who controls mankind has been established. Arahitogami is eternal, immortal and immortal. With the eternal divine power, spread the truth. Therefore, there is no salvation for living things ...... because God does not save people. All creatures are equal, and they are offerings to 'Their Genesis'. So Nidhogg will not allow Gods. Their Fate and end, burn with hope. The 'Ragnarok' promised by fate will begin.
